fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.temperature

Interface Heater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericDevice

    public interface Heater
extends GenericDevice
    Service definition of a simple heater device.
    Author:
    bourretp

    • Field Detail

      • HEATER_POWER_LEVEL

        static final String HEATER_POWER_LEVEL
        Service property indicating the current power level of the heater.
        • This property is mandatory
        • Type of values : java.lang.Double, between 0.0d and 1.0d
        • Description : value is 0.0d when the heater is completely turned off, 1.0d when completely turned on.
        See Also:
        getPowerLevel(), setPowerLevel(double), Constant Field Values

      • HEATER_MAX_POWER_LEVEL

        static final String HEATER_MAX_POWER_LEVEL
        Service property indicating the max power level of the heater in Watts.
        • This property is mandatory
        • Type of value : java.lang.Double fixed to 1000.0 Watts.
        See Also:
        getMaxPowerLevel(), Constant Field Values

      • HEATER_UPDATE_PERIOD

        static final String HEATER_UPDATE_PERIOD
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setPowerLevel

        double setPowerLevel(double level)
        Change the power level of this heater.
        Parameters:
        level - the new power level of this heater.
        Returns:
        the previous power level of this heater.
        See Also:
        getPowerLevel(), HEATER_POWER_LEVEL
